67402.「では タロットに 運命をたずねてみましょう。\n 心をしずめて ゆっくりと\n:
Let's ask the Tarot about your fate. Please
take a moment to calm your mind, and
then draw a card...

67474.「ここで お会いしたのも 何かのご縁。\n 出会えた幸運を祝して あなたの\n:
It must've been fate that we met here. To
celebrate this meeting, I would like to tell
your fortune.
<select>
Draw without thinking.
Draw with a calm mind.
Draw passionately!
Cancel
<select_end>
<case 1>
<break>
<case 2>
<break>
<case 3>
<break>
<case 4>
<break>
<case_cancel>
<break>
<case_end>

67798.「占いは 出会いのたびに 一度だけ\n 行うものです。次に出会えたときに\n ま:
I can only tell your fortune once per
encounter. The next time we meet, I can
tell your fortune again.
<bw_break>

67799.「さて……占いは 終了です。\n タロットの示した運命が これから先の\n あな:
So...that is all for your fortune. I hope that
the Tarot's fate will help to guide you on
your journey.
<bw_break>

67800.「私は まだもうしばらく この魔法の迷宮で \n 次の運命を 待とうと思います。:
I think I'll stay in the Magic Maze for awhile
longer, waiting for my next destiny. I hope
that we shall meet one day again soon.
<turn_end>

71215.「あなたの運命を示すカードの裏に\n もう１枚 カードが隠れていました。\n こ:
Behind the card that shows your destiny, there is another card hidden... This is the... The Wheel of Fortune. The Tarot must
be guiding you here. This card is for you.

71804.「まあ……。どうやら かばんが\n いっぱいのようですね。\n<br>\n「特別:
Well... Looks like your bag is full... I may
be able to give you a special card, so please
empty your bags and talk to me again...<turn_end>

72400.「このカードを 魔法の迷宮の像に捧げることで\n コイン同様 悪霊の神々と戦えま:
By offering this card to the statue in Magic Maze, you can fight against the evil gods as well as the coins. However, it is valid for
<%dL_KOUKA_TIME> days from today. Unlike coins, Wheel of Fortune cards cannot be given to others. You have to fight it yourself. It
is your destiny. The card will become useless when it expires. Please be careful.

72401.「このカードを 魔法の迷宮の像に捧げることで\n コイン同様 アトラスと戦えます:
By dedicating this card to the statue in Magic Maze, you can fight Atlas as well as the coins. However, it is valid for
<%dL_KOUKA_TIME> days from today. Unlike coins, the Wheel of Fate card cannot be given to others. You have to fight it yourself. It
is your destiny. The card will become useless when it expires. Please be careful.

72402.「このカードを 魔法の迷宮の像に捧げることで\n コイン同様 バズズと戦えます。:
By dedicating this card to the Magic Maze statue, you can fight Pazuzu as well as the coin. However, it is valid for
<%dL_KOUKA_TIME> days from today. Unlike coins, the Wheel of Fate card cannot be given to others. You have to fight it yourself. It
is your destiny. The card will become useless when it expires. Please be careful.

72403.「このカードを 魔法の迷宮の像に捧げることで\n コイン同様 ベリアルと戦えます:
By sacrificing this card to the Magic Maze statue, you can fight Belial as well as the coins. However, it is valid for
<%dL_KOUKA_TIME> days from today. Unlike coins, the Wheel of Fate card cannot be given to others. You have to fight it yourself. It
is your destiny. The card will become useless when it expires. Please be careful.

72404.「このカードを 魔法の迷宮の像に捧げることで\n コイン同様 ドラゴンガイアと戦:
By sacrificing this card to the statue in Magic Maze, you can fight Gaia Dragon as well as the coins. However, it is valid for
<%dL_KOUKA_TIME> days from today. Unlike coins, the Wheel of Fate card cannot be given to others. You have to fight it yourself. It
is your destiny. The card will become useless when it expires. Please be careful.

72406.「このカードは あなたが これより\n <%nL_KOUKA_TIME>時間の間:
This card indicates that you are destined to
be excited when your companion dies for
<%dL_KOUKA_TIME> hours from now...<bw_break>

72407.「このカードは あなたが これより\n <%nL_KOUKA_TIME>時間の間:
This card indicates that you're destined to add the occasional bit of horse manure to the treasure chests your enemies drop for the
next <%dL_KOUKA_TIME> hours.

This card indicates that you're destined to

<%dL_KOUKA_TIME> hours...<bw_break>

This card indicates that you have a 50%
chance of surviving with 1 HP in the event of
death for <%dL_KOUKA_TIME> hours from now...<bw_break>

This card indicates that you are destined to

72418.占いをした日から\n<%dL_KOUKA_TIME>日間 効果が持続します。\n:
The effect lasts for <%dL_KOUKA_TIME> days
from the date of divination... Time spent
logged out is not included...

72419.「このカードを 魔法の迷宮の像に捧げることで\n コイン同様 キングヒドラと戦え:
By sacrificing this card to the statue in Magic Maze, you can fight King Hydra as well as the coins. However, it is valid for
